metadata.title: CVE-2024-39471 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: add error handle to avoid out-of-boundsif the sdma_v4_0_irq_id_to_seq return -EINVAL, the process shouldbe stop to avoid out-of-bounds read, so directly return -EINVAL.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
